adviseScripts.text: How dare these stupid humans not salute me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text:
Why?
Don't they understand I am a far superior being?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: If you salute first, they will salute back.
Teach these stupid people how to act.
Will do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Ugh! What a pain!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I practice some salutes with Drake.
Hahahaha!!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Ha! Hahaha!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Hee hee...
Hahahaha!
Your laugh sounds creepy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Hahahaha!!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I laugh with Drake for a long time.
I've collected 5 pizza coupons!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Now I can finally get one for free!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Haha! I'm pretty awesome, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: ... Do you want me to order it for you?
You are pretty awesome!

If you don't mind.
I'm not so good at that kind of thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text:
But I just can't call the pizza boy.
I'm not so good at that kind of thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Drake praise pizza for a long time.
I saw an old man fall down on the street today!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I can't believe no one went to help him!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text:
So, I used my own strength!
I picked him right up!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: You should've let him get up on his own.
How admirable of you.

Moron! How stupid!
How could I treat a poor old man like that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Oh, hush.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: You'll make me blush.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Drake about kindness.
There is no hope for stupid mankind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: They're doomed for sure!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: You have to save them, Drake.
You're right. These stupid humans are beyond help!
I will.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Just trust in me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Don't talk like that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: You're the Commander! Aren't you ashamed of yourself?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Drake about world peace.

Maxwell comes up with
so many weird inventions every day!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: There's no way she can win battles by relying so much on equipment!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: They are just decoration.
Since Maxwell made them, they must be very effective, right?

No!
All equipment is useful!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: How can you not understand this? Moron!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Yes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Once you get used to them, you'll never go back.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Drake about the importance of equipment.
Some of my so-called little fans asked me for my autograph the other day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: They're so annoying.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: How many did you give them?
I know, it's annoying.

And it takes me so long to do my gorgeously long signature!
My arms are sore!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Hey! It's just their nature!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Drake tells me how to deal with kids.
I hate vegetables.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: All I want is meat!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text:
So, buy me some Nutrium!
Right! Now!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I don't have any money.
Not before you finish your vegetables.
You poor guy!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Come on. I'll buy some for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Okay.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: But you'd better keep your word!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Drake talk about the wonders of meat.
Fighting is very satisfying,
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: but it's also a little terrifying.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Do you know what I'm afraid of?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Becoming too powerful.
Losing your life.
That's right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text:
I'm already too powerful!
I'm afraid of getting stronger!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: It's so lonely at the top!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I've never been afraid of death.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Well... Never mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Perhaps my fears are too complex for simpletons to understand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Drake about fighting.
I only eat well-done meat!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Eating meat that's not completely cooked makes no sense to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I suppose I wouldn't mind trying it rare or medium...
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: But meat is limited, so we can't waste it on experimentation.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Challenging your taste is always fascinating.
How about eating and cooking at the same time?
No. Meaningless challenges like that are a waste.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text:
What if that undercooked meat is not good?
What if I don't like it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Are you willing to take responsibility for that, Moron?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Moron, you're a genius!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Drake about meat.
In order to become the ultimate villain,
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I believe you need to watch horror movies all alone.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Can you handle watching horror movies on your own?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Horror movies are child's plays to me.
I can't stand horror movies.
You're tougher than I initially thought.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: We'll have to see who can handle the most extreme horror movie at some point.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Even though my winning is a foregone conclusion.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Hmph.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Your weakness sickens me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Drake and talk about horror movies.
The heat.... the bright sunlight...
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: You can't beat summer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I hope we reclaim the surface soon so I can immerse myself in nature once again.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Summer is a perfect fit for you.
I'd have thought winter would be a better fit for you.
I hate to admit it, but you're right. For once.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Fiery heat and passion... everything that's associated with summer is a perfect fit for me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Winter has its own charm, but
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I still think summer is a better fit for me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Drake and I talk about the pros and cons of summer.
I'm about to go to the police station and check something off my bucket list.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Soon I shall become the ultimate supervillain.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: In order to accomplish that, I'll go to the police station and...
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: free all of the criminals who are locked up.
have them put you behind bars.
You dolt!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: What are you saying?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: The police busted their humps catching those criminals! Why would I undo all of their hard work?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Besides, those criminals deserve to be locked up!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: How did you know?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Do you dream of becoming a villain as well?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Well, this city only has room for one supervillain, so back off!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I got some tips from Drake on how to become the ultimate villain.
I just got this text... someone called me an angel!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Can you believe that?! Me! An angel!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Just block that person's account
Tell them that you're no angel, but instead the ultimate villain.
Well... I thought that might be a little extreme, so
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I just thanked them and left it at that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: That's a fantastic reply!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: That's exactly right! I'm no angel! I'm Drake, the ultimate supervillain!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: They caught me off guard, so I still haven't replied.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I'll send them that reply when I have a minute.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Drake and I had a very enjoyable discussion.
Do you know what a villain should do on a roller coaster?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Not wear their seat belt?
Never close their eyes?
You moron, what kind of an answer is that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Sometimes I wonder if you actually
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: want to become a villain or not.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Bingo! To be a true villain, you can't close your eyes
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: until the roller coaster ends.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: That's why I keep my eyes open the entire time! Mwahaha!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Drake and I talk about our favorite roller coasters.
I didn't want any sauce with my fried chicken today, but they gave me some anyway.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: One of the employees must have screwed up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: File a complaint and send that employee packing!
Fried chicken is great even with the sauce.
Jeez, have a heart!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: It was just one little mistake... nothing worth firing someone over.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: You're right about that, nothing beats a good piece of fried chicken!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I polished off those drumsticks in no time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Tomorrow I'll order half with sauce and half without. That way, the employee won't get confused.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Drake and I continue to talk about chicken.
I've been looking for a new hobby,
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: but I can't decide what I'd like to do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Take up a high-energy sport.
Horticulture can be very therapeutic...
Hmm... Nikkes don't technically need any exercise, but
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: sports could be a nice way to pass the time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I'll look into it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Are you seriously telling me I should start growing plants?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: You're dumber than I thought.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Drake and I talk more about different hobbies.
If you could turn invisible, what's the first thing you would do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Annihilate every last Rapture.
Rob a bank.
Great minds think alike! I was thinking the exact same thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Although to be fair, I could vanquish all of them without the invisibility gimmick.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: You idiot!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: You're rotten to the core!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Don't you realize how many people you could end up hurting?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: You shouldn't do things like that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Drake and I spend time imagining what we'd do if we were invisible.
When my time is up, what do you think I should have written on my headstone?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: What?! You'll never die!
Here lies the ultimate supervillain.
Damn straight!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Death is for the weak!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: I shall be immortal! Mwahaha!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: It has a nice ring to it, but the only problem is... true villains never die!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Having said that... I'm gonna take that idea of yours.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Don't even think about using it on your own headstone.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Drake and I talk about death.
I was planning on eating some fried chicken with Laplace,
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: but she wants it super spicy!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Spicy chicken is the best!
Spicy fried chicken can be good, as long as it's mild.
I'm a wuss when it comes to spicy stuff.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: My thoughts exactly! You don't want to go overboard with the spice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Besides, who says a villain has to like spicy food?
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Hahahahaha!!
adviseScripts.speaker: Drake

adviseScripts.text: Drake and I talk about our favorite way to eat chicken.
